title: Pakistan has shot down 77 Indian drones so far: state media - DAWN.COM
content:
Pakistan has taken down a total of 77 Indian drones so far, state media PTV reported.

“By the evening of May 8, Pakistan shot 29 Indian drones, while an additional 48 drones were destroyed since last night,” PTV said citing security sources. It added that Pakistan was giving a “befitting response” to Indian aggression.
